item.title: Leap Second
item.description:
A while ago (okay June) I was up making sure our systems were okay during the leap second. I was hoping atleast to get a good example out of it using this fine script.

while true; do date && sleep 1; done

Sadly the mac has been fixed. Apparently over 10 years ago. Below I have output of the mac telling time correctly.

Tue Jun 30 18:59:52 CDT 2015
Tue Jun 30 18:59:53 CDT 2015
Tue Jun 30 18:59:54 CDT 2015
Tue Jun 30 18:59:55 CDT 2015
Tue Jun 30 18:59:56 CDT 2015
Tue Jun 30 18:59:57 CDT 2015
Tue Jun 30 18:59:58 CDT 2015
Tue Jun 30 18:59:59 CDT 2015
Tue Jun 30 19:00:00 CDT 2015
Tue Jun 30 19:00:01 CDT 2015
Tue Jun 30 19:00:02 CDT 2015
Tue Jun 30 19:00:03 CDT 2015
Tue Jun 30 19:00:04 CDT 2015
Tue Jun 30 19:00:05 CDT 2015
Tue Jun 30 19:00:06 CDT 2015
Tue Jun 30 19:00:07 CDT 2015
Tue Jun 30 19:00:08 CDT 2015
